answers.answer: That's great news! Congratulations and good luck!Heather

You are much welcome Bird. I will keep you in my prayers.. it is well with you. your womb is covered with the blood of Jesus. You will carry this pregnancy to term and you will be delivered of a healthy baby.God bless you.Y.
THANK YOU ALL SOOOO MUCH FOR SHARING THIS JOY WITH ME AND THE PRAYERS. MAY GOD BLESS ALL OF YOU!!!!

question: I WANT TO THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR THE PRAYER. I JUST FOUND OUT YESTERDAY THAT I WAS PG AGAIN AFTER MY M/C 5/22. I DON'T WANT TO GO THROUGH THAT AGAIN . MY FAMILY AND I HAVE BEEN PRAYING ABOUT THAT. IT SEEMS THAT I HAVE SOOO MANY HEALTH PROBLEMS, DIABETES BEING THE LEADING ONE. I WENT TO CHURCH LAST NIGHT AND I AM REALLY PRAYING AND BELIEVING GOD FOR MY HEALING AND A HEALTHY BABY 9MONTHS FROM NOW. THANKS SO MUCH FOR THE PRAYER. I WILL KEEP YOU POSTED.
title: SWEETNESS
